data.text: Dimaadua ga helekai mai i di madagoaa o Nebuchadnezzar di king o Babylonia mo dana llongo dauwa madalia nia buini dauwa o nia henua huogodoo ala e noho i lala ono mogobuna le e heebagi hai baahi gi Jerusalem mo ono waahale lligi ala i dono baahi.34.1 2 Kings 25.1-11; 2 Kronikel 36.17-21
Dimaadua, go di God o Israel, ga helekai mai bolo au gii hana gi helekai gi Zedekiah, di king o Judah, “Au, go Dimaadua, gaa wanga di waahale deenei gi di king o Babylonia, gei mee gaa dudu di maa.
Goe ga deemee di lele gi daha, goe gaa kumu gaa lahi gi mee. Goolua ga heetugi i gulu hadumada, ga helekai gi mee i gulu huaidina dangada, nomuli, gei goe gaa lahi gi Babylonia.
Zedekiah, hagalongo gi agu mee ala ga helekai i di goe. Goe hagalee e made i tauwa.

Goe gaa made i di aumaalia, gei di madagoaa ma ga danu iei goe, nia daangada gaa dudu nadau ‘incense’ adu gi di goe, gadoo be di nadau hai dela ne dudu nadau tigidaumaha kala i di danu o damana mmaadua ala nogo king i oo mua. Digaula ga tangitangi gi di goe mo di hai boloo, ‘Di madau king guu made!’ Au go Dimaadua ne helekai.”
Gei au ga helekai gi di King Zedekiah i di hagailoo deenei i lodo Jerusalem

i di madagoaa digau dauwa o Babylonia ala e heebagi gi di waahale deelaa. Digau dauwa e heebagi labelaa gi Lachish mo Azekah, nia waahale e lua ala gu abaaba gi mau dangihi ala ne dubu i golo i Judah.
Di King Zedekiah mo digau Jerusalem gaa hai di nadau hagababa e hagamehede
nadau hege ala go digau Hebrew, nia daane mono ahina, bolo tangada gi de haga hege tangada i ana daangada Israel.
Nia daangada huogodoo mo nadau dagi guu baba ginai bolo e hagamehede nadau gau hege ga hagalee e haga hege labelaa digaula, gei digaula gu hagamehede digaula.
Nomuli hua, digaula gaa huli nadau hagamaanadu, ga laha mai labelaa digaula gaa hono digaula gii hai nia hege labelaa.
Deenei laa Dimaadua,

go di God o Israel, ga helekai mai bolo au gi helekai gi nia daangada aalaa, “Au gu hagababa ang gi godou damana mmaadua i dagu daa digaula gi daha mo Egypt, ga haga mehede digaula gi daha mo nadau mouli hege. Au gu helekai gi digaula

bolo i di waalooloo o nia ngadau dagi hidu huogodoo, gei digaula gi haga mehede ina nadau hege ala go digau Hebrew ala nogo haga hai hegau go digaula ang gi ginaadou i nia ngadau e ono. Gei godou damana mmaadua nogo hagalee hagadahidamee ge hagalee e hagalongo gi agu helekai.34.14 Exodus 21.2; Deuteronomy 15.12

Nia laangi dulii guu too gi daha, goodou guu huli godou hagamaanadu, guu hai di mee dela e hagatenetene Au. Goodou huogodoo guu baba bolo e hagamehede godou hege ala go digau Israel, gei goodou ne hagababa beenei i mua ogu golomada i lodo di Hale Daumaha, i di gowaa dela e hai daumaha goodou mai gi di Au.

Gei goodou guu huli godou hagamaanadu labelaa, gu haga huaidu dogu hagalabagau. Goodou huogodoo gu laha mai labelaa nia hege ala ne hagamehede go goodou mai i nadau hiihai bolo e hagamehede, gei goodou gu hono adu digaula gi lodo di mouli hege.

Deenei laa, Au go Dimaadua, ga helekai bolo goodou huogodoo gu de hagalongo mai gi di Au. Goodou gu hagalee e dumaalia ang gi godou hege ala go digau Israel gi mehede. Deenei laa, e humalia, gei Au gaa hai goodou gii noho maahede, goodou gii noho maahede gii mmade i tauwa, tau magi mo tau magamaga. Au gaa hai digau o nia henua huogodoo o henuailala gi mmaadagu i dagu hai dela ma gaa hai adu gi goodou.

Digau aamua o Judah mo Jerusalem, mo digau aamua o lodo di hale di king, mo digau hai mee dabu, mo nia dagi huogodoo, la guu hai di nadau hagababa mai gi di Au i di nadau taele i mehanga nia baahi kau daane e lua ala ne haahi go digaula, gaa hai nia baahi e lua. Gei digaula gu oho di hagababa deelaa, gu hagalee e daudali nia haganoho o di maa. Malaa, gei Au gaa hai ang gi nia daangada gadoo be di nadau hai ne hai ang gi di kau daane deelaa.
Au ga hagi anga digaula gi nadau hagadaumee ala e hiihai e daaligi digaula, gei nia manu mamaangi mono manu lodo henua gaa gai nnuaidina digaula.
Au gaa wanga labelaa Zedekiah, di king o Judah, mo ana gau aamua gi digau ala e hiihai e daaligi digaula. Au gaa wanga digaula gi digau dauwa o Babylonia, ala guu dugu nadau hai dauwa adu gi goodou.

Gei Au ga haganoho dagu hai, digaula ga loomoi gi di waahale deenei, ga heebagi adu, ga hagamagedaa, gaa dudu di maa, gei Au gaa hai nia waahale o Judah gii hai be di anga henua, tangada e noho i golo ai. Au go Dimaadua ne helekai.”
